item.title: A Hostage Released From Gaza Campaigns for the Release of Others
item.description: Trepidation over the fate of other captives has left Ilana Gritzewsky little time for self-healing after her own violent abduction.

item.title: Secret War Plans Shared in Group Chat, and U.S. Food Banks Scramble
item.description: Plus, why you might develop allergies as an adult.

item.title: America’s Most Powerful Law Firms Won’t Stand Up to Trump
item.description: Bowing to Trump won’t protect their businesses and clients.
